statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT(sender_id) FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING transaction_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT receiver_id, sender_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_id = 101 AND receiver_id = 201;
SELECT peer_name, peer_address FROM peer_details;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, pd.peer_name AS sender_name, pd.peer_address AS sender_address, th.amount FROM transaction_history th JOIN peer_details pd ON th.sender_id = pd.peer_id WHERE th.amount <= 500 ORDER BY th.transaction_id;

SELECT pd.peer_name AS sender_name, pd.peer_address AS receiver_address, th.amount FROM transaction_history th JOIN peer_details pd ON th.receiver_id = pd.peer_id WHERE th.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY th.amount DESC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.sender_id, th.receiver_id, th.amount, pd.peer_name AS receiver_name, pd.peer_address AS receiver_address FROM transaction_history th JOIN peer_details pd ON th.receiver_id = pd.peer_id ORDER BY th.amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Transaction;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM Peer WHERE peer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PeerTransaction ORDER BY peer_transaction_id DESC;
SELECT peer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM PeerTransaction GROUP BY peer_id;
SELECT * FROM Peer;
SELECT peer_id, name, email FROM Peer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT Peer.name, Transaction.amount FROM Peer JOIN PeerTransaction ON Peer.peer_id = PeerTransaction.peer_id JOIN Transaction ON PeerTransaction.transaction_id = Transaction.transaction_id;

SELECT Peer.name, Peer.email, Transaction.amount, Transaction.transaction_date FROM Peer JOIN PeerTransaction ON Peer.peer_id = PeerTransaction.peer_id JOIN Transaction ON PeerTransaction.transaction_id = Transaction.transaction_id WHERE Peer.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Transaction.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT peer_name, balance FROM peer ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT peer1_id, peer2_id FROM peer_relationship WHERE relationship_type = 'Friendship' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT peer_name, balance FROM peer ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, sender_id FROM transaction_history WHERE receiver_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT peer1_id, peer2_id, relationship_type FROM peer_relationship WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT peer_id, balance FROM peer_accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT name, email FROM peer_details ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT peer_id, name, email FROM peer_details WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT peer1_id, peer2_id FROM peer_relationship WHERE relationship_type = 'friendship' AND peer1_id < peer2_id;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT status_id, status, update_time FROM transaction_status ORDER BY update_time ASC LIMIT 5;
